## Type of Change
<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Build system changes
- [ ] Asset extraction/import

## Related Issues
<!-- Link related issues: Closes #XX, Related to #YY -->


## Testing Checklist
- [ ] ROM builds successfully (`.\build.ps1`)
- [ ] ROM matches original (`F71817F5...` hash)
- [ ] Code follows project conventions (`.editorconfig`)
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced

## Documentation Checklist
<!-- REQUIRED: Update documentation for code changes -->
- [ ] Updated relevant `.md` files in `docs/` (if applicable)
- [ ] Updated code comments for new/modified functions
- [ ] Updated `README.md` (if adding new tools/features)
- [ ] Updated `CHANGELOG.md` with changes
- [ ] Added/updated examples or usage instructions
